SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.rendering

Class RotatingSheetAnimationRenderComponent

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.Component
com.csse3200.game.rendering.RenderComponent
com.csse3200.game.rendering.RotatingSheetAnimationRenderComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, Renderable, AutoCloseable, Comparable<Renderable>
public class RotatingSheetAnimationRenderComponent extends RenderComponent implements AutoCloseable
Render component for frame animations cut from a PNG sprite sheet (not .atlas), supporting grid slicing with rotation, scaling, custom origin, a completion event (animationFinished), and layer/z-index control.

  • Method Details

    • fromSheet

      public static RotatingSheetAnimationRenderComponent fromSheet(String pngPath, int cols, int rows, int frameW, int frameH, float frameDur, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation.PlayMode playMode, String animName)
      Build from a grid-sliced PNG sheet. This constructor loads the Texture internally.
      Parameters:
      pngPath - path to the PNG sprite sheet
      cols - number of columns
      rows - number of rows
      frameW - frame width in pixels
      frameH - frame height in pixels
      frameDur - duration of each frame in seconds
      playMode - libGDX Animation.PlayMode
      animName - logical animation name for events/logging
